* Iron Raptor smiled a bit more at his answer and his casual posture but she had seen the concern in his optics and the love as well, she reached out with a weak hand and stroked his cheek.
Her wound had began to slowly stop bleeding and begin to slowly repair as well, but the loss of fluid was beginning to lower her body temp and make her shiver a bit.
She stroked his cheek again but even her arms were weak and her hand was slowly lowering from his face as the chills set in, her color a bit lighter then before.*

" I'm a bit...cold."

* She answered his question before closing her optics for a few moments but then opening them again, still the tired but loving look in them.
Iron Raptor sighed, despite the covers she was cold.
She looked back at Prowl and almost envied him for being so warm, her hand against his cheek being the only harm part of her body due to his own heat.
But she then pulled the covers closer to her with her free hand, hoping that it would help...it wasn't.
Iron Raptor looked back into his optics but then dropped her hand from his cheek to his arm...just to weak to keep it's strength.*
